steps.dialogue: Look at these fractions. Which ones are greater than one whole?
steps.prompt: Select all the fractions that are greater than one whole.

correct_answer.context: 7/4 and 4/3 are improper fractions where the numerator is greater than the denominator, making them greater than one whole

steps.success_path_dialogue: Correct. Both 7/4 and 4/3 have numerators greater than their denominators, so they're greater than one.
